channel.title: Cannot find main class gui
channel.description: hey guys so my friend has a server and this only happens to some people it gives them the message in the title we tried everything re downloading java we checked for the spelling but it won't work it works fine with me but for some people it doesn't heres our run.bat code [code]@echo off cd Client Files start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit [/code] and yes i have searched every inch of the internet but i didn't find an answer

item.title: Cannot find main class gui
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Leroy_rsps:

Have you tried replacing ‘Exit’ with ‘Pause’?

nah when the runbat runs u can place exit or pause, it will stay open.
How else he would be able to read the error?

OT: check in the source of the gui.java is actually there

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot find main class gui
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

hey guys so my friend has a server and this only happens to some people it gives them the message in the title we tried everything re downloading java we checked for the spelling but it won’t work it works fine with me but for some people it doesn’t heres our run.bat code

@echo off cd Client Files start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
and yes i have searched every inch of the internet but i didn’t find an answer

Read full topic
